meanings.definition: A person who conforms to accepted behavior or established practices.
meanings.sent1: The group of conformists all wore the same uniform to school.
meanings.sent2: The conformists in the office always followed the company rules.
meanings.sent3: The conformists decided to all bring sandwiches for lunch, making a funny sight.
meanings.sent4: She stood out in the sea of conformists, daring to be different.
meanings.sent5: The image of the conformists marching in line was etched in his mind.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to conformists or conformity.
meanings.sent1: Her conformists beliefs made her blend in with the crowd.
meanings.sent2: The conformists mindset influenced his decision to follow the tradition.
meanings.sent3: The party had a conformists theme, with everyone dressed in the same color.
meanings.sent4: The conformists culture of the town was evident in their daily routines.
meanings.sent5: The conformists atmosphere of the meeting stifled any creative ideas.
